long_description: The Sherpani Cappi bag is simple, cute and functional; adjustable strap lets you carry it cross-body or on your shoulder. Deep main compartment with a zippered closure holds your travel items and everyday essentials; signature floral lining brightens up the interior. Sherpani Cappi bag features 2 zippered exterior pockets, 1 internal zippered pocket, a key fob and a rear open pocket. Closeout.
short_description: The Sherpani Cappi bag is simple, cute and functional; adjustable strap lets you carry it cross-body or on your shoulder.
